column5: Just sitting around this afternoon and thought I would draw. Ended up with the picture bellow and thought to myself that this might be nice on the back of a t-shirt with maybe my name on the front. Then I got thinking of maybe doing a whole series of Canadian "FISH" Fishereman...eg, walleye, trout, pike, musky etc.....I was just wondering, would anyone else be interested in my idea? Any suggestions or orders? I have no idea what it would cost to print onto a t-shirt but I do have a friend in the printing industry. Any feedback would be appreciated. Thanks for looking.
I like it!!  I can tell it's free hand... I dabble as well.... Great Job!  RFS
. Any feedback would be appreciated. Thanks for looking.    Unless you meant "  Canadian   Fisherman"     I have a hard time telling where the "B" is... Other than that .......... Bang On!  RFS
Looks great  Now that Randy pointed it out--kinda see what he means with the "B"  Otherwise excellent job  Bushart
looks great!!!! keep em coming

great job! can you do me a favour?  draw up a tattoo for me please? something with a canadian touch to it. could be fishing related. make it real badass! lol up to you if you wanna do it or not, no pressure. i got another idea, maybe a fish skeleton of some sort?  thanks man,  JP
Looks... Right On ...to me.

I know what you mean about tha B. I think the next ones I do will just have the fish, not the letters. It's pretty obvious what kind of fish it is without the letters, right?   great job! can you do me a favour?  draw up a tattoo for me please? something with a canadian touch to it. could be fishing related. make it real badass! lol up to you if you wanna do it or not, no pressure. i got another idea, maybe a fish skeleton of some sort?
now that....... i like! looks great man, thanks!  JP
Great Edit !!  Bang On!!     The "B" is where it should "B"  RFS
Nice job trevy727 Looks awesome!!! Leechman
thanks guys, here's a couple more.
You got mad skills I like them Keep them coming and thanks for sharing Leechman
Are you looking at pics for inspiration or  are they 100% imagined?  Either way, killer stuff.
Great job
Dang that is killer when I get my musky done for a tat i will look you up for sure.
Those are dope! You've got a wicked talent.
Very talented! Keep them coming!
I'm gonna do a walleye tat wrapping around my calf one day...I will have to see if you have a nice walleye drawing then
jeez, i had NO idea what you guys were talking about with that "B" lol. now i can see though.
I just finished a musky but it was for someone so i didn't post it. Next will be a walleye. maybe after the hockey game. thanks everyone for all the possitive comments. go Canada!
Fantastic! That's a unique angle of the Brookie. I like it a lot.
Thanks Dan, I think it's still a little light in colors.
I look at pictures for distictive characteristics and colors.
Great work!
